config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The 'verboseLog' configuration option is used to determine whether to print additional logging information during the execution of the 'onFinished' method. If 'args.verboseLog' is true, the method will print the log message passed as a parameter.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The 'verboseLog' configuration is triggered whenever the 'onFinished' method is called.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'verboseLog' configuration option on the system is minimal if set to false, as it will skip printing the log message. However, if set to true, it may impact performance slightly due to the additional logging operations.
